title: Sky cries Mary until the grinders cease
creator_credit: Sky Cries Mary, Terry Amidei and A J Pruzan
brief_description: A pulsating montage of image and music from experimental music artists, Sky Cries Mary. Six pieces are performed - 1. Propergenda 2. Barh House 3. Und die flamen 4. Shakespeare factory 5. When fear stops 6. 9 Nite chant. All music is written and performed by Roderick Auer Stringfellow.
